text: Alazopeptin is an antibiotic, with moderate anti-trypanosomal. and antitumor activity. It was originally isolated from Streptomyces griseoplanus, sourced from soil near Williamsburg, Iowa. It is still largely produced via fermentation broths of that organism. ==References== Category:Antibiotics Category:Allyl compounds Category:Diazo compounds
title: Alazopeptin
